name: rili-server
description: The server side code for Rili

scripts.run:postgres:dev: docker container run --name rili-postgres-dev -d -p 127.0.0.1:7432:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=riliAdmin -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=secret postgres:latest
scripts.run:redis:dev: docker container run --name rili-redis-pub-dev -d -p 17771:6379 redis:latest && docker container run --name rili-redis-sub-dev -d -p 17772:6379 redis:latest
scripts.setup:dev: npm run run:postgres:dev && npm run run:redis:dev
scripts.start:server:api: npm run start:postgres && ../node_modules/.bin/pm2 start pm2/ecosystem.config.js --only rili-server-api --env production
scripts.start:server:api:dev: npm run start:postgres:dev && npm run build:dev && ../node_modules/.bin/nodemon --require=../node_modules/dotenv/config build/server-api.js dotenv_config_path=../.env --withSQLLogs
scripts.start:server:socketio: npm run start:redis && ../node_modules/.bin/pm2 start pm2/ecosystem.config.js --only rili-server-socket-io --env production
scripts.start:server:socketio:dev: npm run start:redis:dev && npm run build:dev && ../node_modules/.bin/nodemon --require=../node_modules/dotenv/config build/server-socket-io.js dotenv_config_path=../.env --withAllLogs
scripts.start:docker: npm run start:postgres && npm run start:redis
scripts.start:docker:dev: npm run start:postgres:dev && npm run start:redis:dev
scripts.test: npm run lint:fix && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 0

author: Rili, Inc.
